isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - AIR COMPRESSOR REPLACE, GEAR DRIVEN (CUMMINS M11)

wtsproc.wtsdescrip: AIR COMPRESSOR REPLACE, GEAR DRIVEN (CUMMINS M11)
wtsproc.config: Vehicle is equipped with air conditioning.

step1.para: Chock wheels. Open hood.
Drain cooling system.
Disconnect battery.
Drain air tanks. Close valves.
Remove air inlet line from engine to air compressor.
Disconnect air lines at governor. Remove governor.
Remove support bracket at frame rail retaining wire harness and hoses for access.
Disconnect fuel inlet and return lines from fuel pump. Remove fuel lines from fuel pump to engine.
Disconnect wiring to fuel shutdown solenoid.
Remove bolts retaining fuel pump to air compressor. Remove fuel pump support bracket bolts from engine and remove fuel pump.
Disconnect coolant lines from air compressor. Cap ends.
Disconnect air discharge line from air compressor.
Raise vehicle and support axle with stands.
Remove bolts retaining power steering pump to engine. Lay pump aside and secure for access.

note.para: Do not open power steering system.

step1.para: Remove bolts retaining air compressor to drive gear housing. Remove air compressor.
Clean all mating surfaces.
Transfer fittings.
Install air compressor with new gasket. Torque bolts to spec.
Install power steering pump with new gasket. Torque bolts to spec.
Lower vehicle.
Connect air discharge line to air compressor.
Connect coolant lines to air compressor.
Install fuel pump with new gasket; include bolts retaining support bracket to engine. Torque bolts to spec.
Connect wiring to fuel shutdown solenoid.
Install fuel lines to engine and fuel pump. Connect supply and return lines to fuel pump.
Install wire/hose support bracket to frame rail.
Install governor with new gasket to air compressor. Connect air lines to governor.
Install air inlet line to engine and air compressor.
Connect battery.
Fill cooling system.
Start engine. Check operation of air compressor.
Check for leaks. Check engine oil level. Add as needed.
Close hood. Remove wheel chocks.
